room.name: the living room
room.short_description: this is the living room of an old house
room.long_description: The living room looks very old and run down, there's a couch in the corner with cuts in it, and cobwebs all over the walls

room.name: the bed room
room.long_description: The small dirty bed room of the house with walls painted dark blue

room.name: the kitchen
room.long_description: The kitchen has many white cabinets with every single door ripped off

room.name: the bathroom
room.short_description: this is the small bathroom of the house
room.long_description: The bathroom is just big enough you can squeeze through, the toilet has been ripped out of the floor

room.name: the garage
room.short_description: this is the garrage attached to the house
room.long_description: The wet garage has many rats running into the cracks in the walls

room.name: the deck
room.short_description: this is the deck about 2 feet off the ground
room.long_description: The old deck has many loose boards, as you look down you can see something is living under it

room.name: the rec room
room.short_description: this is the rec room of an old house
room.long_description: The rec room looks similar to the living room, there are many holes in the floor where you can actualy see the living room

item.name: tv remote
item.desc: An old tv remote with the batteries missing

item.name: battery
item.desc: 4 batteries that don't look too old

item.name: teddy bear
item.desc: A small brown teddy bear with two different coloured eyes

item.name: stick
item.desc: A wet stick about 4 feet long and 2 inches in diameter
